org.agreement_technologies.service.map_heuristic

Class FFHeuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_heuristic.FFHeuristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Heuristic

    public class FFHeuristic
extends java.lang.Object
implements Heuristic
    FF heuristic function evaluator. This heuristic in only implemented for centralized problems.
    Since:
    1.0

      • evaluatePlan

        public void evaluatePlan(HPlan p,
                int threadIndex,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> achievedLandmarks)
        Multi-heuristic evaluation of a plan, also evaluates the remaining landmarks to achieve. The resulting value is stored inside the plan (see setH method in Plan interface).
        Specified by:
        evaluatePlan in interface Heuristic
        Parameters:
        p - Plan to evaluate
        threadIndex - Thread index, for multi-threading purposes
        achievedLandmarks - List of already achieved landmarks
        Since:
        1.0
